author: Sheena McGinley
title: Pics: Chrissy Teigan makes first red carpet outing since pregnancy news
text:
Yesterday, the news broke that - after many years of trying - Chrissy Teigan and John Legend are going to become parents. Last night, the 29-year-old stepped out in a her staple white form-fitting dress, so many will be looking forward to seeing what she pulls out when the bump starts bursting forth. Because you need that added pressure when you're pregnant.
Also attending last night's La Mer 'Celebration of an Icon' event at Siren Studios in Los Angeles, we had Gwyneth Paltrow in a Galvan jumpsuit...
Kate Hudson wowed in a sheer boho number, complete with bloomage (we're trying to make it a word)...
While Nicole Richie came adorned in a House of Harlow chocker.
MORE: Chrissy Teigan and John Legend are expecting!!
